description: Some politicians are hoping to pause approved education plans in Guernsey.
title: 'Years of uncertainty' if delay to Guernsey education plans approved
title_page: 'Years of uncertainty' if delay to Guernsey education plans approved - BBC News
maintext: However, Dept Andrea Dudley-Owen, one of the seven signatories, said they were "being entirely responsible" because the current plans have not been "substantiated or evidenced to the point that they need to be".
